main event: SGT DJF observed an unidentified flying object near Camp Ledo, Burma on the night of 8 July 1966.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 2100 hours with clear weather conditions and unlimited visibility., The object was initially stationary at an elevation of about 45 degrees before moving rapidly in a northeasterly direction., It emitted a constant bright white light and was estimated to be 20 to 30 feet in diameter., The object was observed for a total of around 5 minutes before disappearing from view., There were no other witnesses to the incident, and a thorough check of aircraft and satellite activity yielded no identification for the object.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting a bright white light
